Plot: Get ready for the bricks to fly when Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman and the rest of the Justice League face off against the world's greatest super villains!
Title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: Justice League - Attack of the Legion of Doom!
Writer: James Krieg (screenplay), Bob Kane (character created by: Batman), Neal Adams (character created by: Man-Bat), Jack Kirby (character created by: Darkseid), William Moulton Marston (character created by: Wonder Woman), Joe Shuster (character created by: Superman), Jerry Siegel (character created by: Superman), Marv Wolfman (characters created by: Deathstroke and Cyborg), George Pérez (characters created by: Deathstroke and Cyborg), Joe Certa (character created by: Martian Manhunter), Joe Samachson (character created by: Martian Manhunter)
Actors: Dee Bradley Baker, Troy Baker, John DiMaggio, Grey Griffin
